Package com.soprabanking.ips.controllers

Class FeedController

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.FeedController
@RestController
@CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping("/feed")
public class FeedController
extends java.lang.Object
Feed Controller This is a controller class to show the different Feed streams on the Landing page. The FeedController Class implements an application which does the following
  • All Proposal Feed
  • User Proposal Feed
  • Team Proposal Feed
Author:
mojha
See Also:
RestController, CrossOrigin, RequestMapping, Autowired, PostMapping

  • Method Details

    • getAllProposalFeed

      @PostMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Proposal>> getAllProposalFeed​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to Display all proposals made by all users in a List which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status Some variables used in this method are
      • list :List of objects of Proposal Type
      • feedService : an Object of the FeedService class
      • fetchAllProposals : a method in class FeedService called by object feedService
      Exception if no proposals return an empty array list with Http Status Not Acceptable
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the proposal object
      Returns:
      Response Entity with a list of proposals from list with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      FeedService, Proposal

    • getUserProposalFeed

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Proposal>> getUserProposalFeed​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to Display user proposals made by the user who is logged in, in a List which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status Some variables used in this method are
      • list :List of objects of Proposal Type
      • feedService : an Object of the FeedService class
      • fetchUserProposals : a method in class FeedService called by object feedService
      Exception if no proposals return an empty array list with Http Status Not Acceptable
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the proposal object
      Returns:
      Response Entity with a list of proposals from list with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      FeedService, Proposal

    • getTeamProposalFeed

      @PostMapping("/team") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getTeamProposalFeed​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to Display team proposals marked to the team of the user who is logged in, in a List which is sent in a Response Entity. This is also the default view of the User. If no proposal is marked to the team this feed will be empty. Some variables used in this method are
      • list :List of objects of Proposal Type
      • feedService : an Object of the FeedService class
      • getDefault : a method in class FeedService called by object feedService
      Exception if no proposals return an empty array list with Http Status Not Acceptable
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the proposal objects
      Returns:
      Response Entity with a list of proposals from list with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      FeedService, Proposal
